content:
Thensenior quarterback Baker Mayfield prepares to throw the ball during the Rose Bowl against Georgia Jan PERIOD   PERIOD

Oklahoma senior quarterback Baker Mayfield gave former Sooners defensive lineman Gerald McCoy a tour of Oklahomas new locker room and his former dorm room PERIOD

College life with BakerMayfieldThe Heisman Trophy winner gave former OUFootball star Geraldini93 a tour of campus and his old dorm room Back2Campus  NFLDraft April  on NFLNetwork NFLDraft pic.twitter.comNH2NuqPLsQ

Mayfield and McCoy were both standouts during their time in the crimson and cream PERIOD Mayfield led Oklahoma to two College Football Playoff appearances along with winning the  Heisman Trophy PERIOD McCoy helped the Sooners to a national title appearance in  and is known as one of the best defensive lineman to come through Norman PERIOD

McCoy is currently entering his ninth season with the Tampa Bay Bucs while Mayfield is expected to go in the early rounds of the  NFL Draft PERIOD The draft will take place April  in Arlington Texas PERIOD
